overview: Coşkun, who grew up in an orphanage, has been in love with the famous actress Derya Altınay since he was a little boy, and his dream is to write a movie script for her. He is so in love with her that he believes he is living with two of the movie characters she played in her old movies. However, these two old characters do not want him to write an original script for Derya Altınay because he will forget about them when a new character is created. So they start an emotional battle to stop him from writing his script.
title: My Dreams, My Love, and You
